title: Rigorous Hausdorff dimension estimates for conformal fractals
authors:
Vasileios Chousionis, Dmitriy Leykekhman, Mariusz Urba\'nski, Erik
  Wendt
abstract:
We develop a versatile framework which allows us to rigorously estimate the
Hausdorff dimension of maximal conformal graph directed Markov systems in
$\mathbb{R}^n$ for $n \geq 2$. Our method is based on piecewise linear
approximations of the eigenfunctions of the Perron-Frobenius operator via a
finite element framework for discretization and iterative mesh schemes. One key
element in our approach is obtaining bounds for the derivatives of these
eigenfunctions, which, besides being essential for the implementation of our
method, are of independent interest.
